item.title: String
item.description: Starred by 25+ users, GitHub Repo: LeetCode Pattern 500 offers: 500 solutions for LeetCode problems in Python and Java 17 notes on essential concepts related to data structures and algorithms 130 patterns for solving LeetCode problems string intro terms palindrome use two pointers odd length or even length anagram use hashmap need to have same length isomorphic use hashmap build bijection mapping relation strobogrammatic number a number whose numeral is rotationally symmetric eg.
